name: Chocolate: The Fantastical Adventure of the Doggy Walk
name_original: Chocolate: The Fantastical Adventure of the Doggy Walk
description:
Take your precious pup, Chocolate, through a fantasy world on a nice little dog walk. Journey through the fields, forests, caves and mountains for a luxurious view than any climber or walker would aspire to see. Protect your doggo from the evil creatures that roam this Island, with the malicious intent to harm your pet. 

  • Travel through 8 maps
  • Escape from the 5 enemies with varying speeds and power
  • Solve unique puzzles to progress on your adventure
  • Form a new connection between you and your dog that this island takes you through.

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam.

Game Programming, Mapping and Music by: River Thompson

Art by: Eve Platt
